verbs.description: [ARG1: U.S. stocks] [V: fell] [C-ARG1: with other markets around the world] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] [ARGM-TMP: after the Trump administration announced tariffs on $ 50 billion of imports from China , raising the possibility of an escalating clash between the world 's two biggest economies] .
